 2002-18902002-11-06,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE LINCOLN M. ALEXANDER, P.C., of Hamilton, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term ending April 1, 2003, effective October 28, 2002.
